resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-datasets
resourceTemplates.title: Eurostat dataset catalogue
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all publicly available datasets in the Eurostat database. Use this to discover dataset codes for further queries.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-data-generic
resourceTemplates.title: Eurostat data query
resourceTemplates.description: Generic query to fetch data for any Eurostat dataset. Provide a dataset code and dimension filters. Output can be JSON-stat or other supported formats.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-by-geo-time
resourceTemplates.title: Eurostat filter by country and year
resourceTemplates.description: Simple query template for dataset, country, and time period. Returns a small subset suitable for testing and dashboards.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-dataflows-sdmx3
resourceTemplates.title: Eurostat SDMX 3.0 dataflows
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all Eurostat dataflows with structural metadata following the SDMX 3.0 specification. Useful for inspecting dataset structure.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-unemployment-template
resourceTemplates.title: Unemployment quick filter
resourceTemplates.description: Convenience template for unemployment data. Filter by country, sex, age group, unit, and number of recent periods to reduce result size.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-hpi-annual
resourceTemplates.title: House Price Index (annual)
resourceTemplates.description: Annual house price index. Filter by country and year. Unit I15 provides index values relative to 2015 = 100.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-construction-output
resourceTemplates.title: Construction production index
resourceTemplates.description: Monthly construction production index. Filter by country and number of recent observations. Returns index values relative to 2015 = 100.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-hicp
resourceTemplates.title: HICP inflation index
resourceTemplates.description: Monthly Harmonised Index of Consumer Prices. Filter by country, category (COICOP), and number of recent months.

resourceTemplates.name: eurostat-employment
resourceTemplates.title: Employment levels (thousands)
resourceTemplates.description: Annual employment numbers in thousands. Filter by country, sex and age group for clear labour market indicators.
